description:
A modified browser built using Electron that helps in responsive web development.


What's Changed
- Address bar bug fix by @Kieren-Foenander in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1396
- Add Samsung Galaxy Fold3 device profiles (Folded & Unfolded, Portrait & Landscape) by @AnalyticalDataArtisan in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1379
- Show the error overlay only for main frame errors by @manojVivek in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1372
New Contributors
- @AnalyticalDataArtisan made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1379
- @Kieren-Foenander made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1396
Full Changelog: https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/compare/v1.16.0...v1.17.0
